backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling access control, user profiles, posts, and a chunked media upload system with internal maps, timers, and validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest listing implemented features, related files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing their roles in the app UI, upload flow, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining the app’s light/dark OKLCH color theme and core CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing authentication, profile setup, routing between feed/viewer/upload views, and shared post URL handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/Feed.tsx: Displays a paginated grid of posts, handling loading, errors, and navigation between pages.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Renders a post preview card, generating a media URL and detecting video content for display.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, upload button, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Landing.tsx: Unauthenticated landing screen with welcome text and icon.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first‑time profile setup allowing name entry and save.
frontend/src/components/upload/UploadBut: Simple button component that triggers the upload flow when clicked.
frontend/src/components/upload/UploadCom: Manages file selection and chunked upload UI, showing progress and handling cancel or completion.
frontend/src/components/viewer/PostViewe: Shows a full post with media, supports sharing and deletion, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedUpload.ts: Handles chunked media uploads with retry, cancellation, progress tracking, and finalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/clear functions, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and posts using an actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark theme colors and radius values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/chunking.ts: Utilities for slicing files into 512KB chunks, computing chunk counts, and determining byte ranges.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, and requirements for an ICP media-sharing app with chunked uploads.
